t: Divot Board Review: My New Favorite Training Aid [Complete Guide] · Practical-Golf.com
s: The Divot Board is not the first product to measure ground contact. Acu-Strike has been out since 2019 and did win best new product at the PGA Merchandise Show. I purchased an Acu-Strike (beware of the cheap knockoffs on Amazon) from their website to compare the performance.
